summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of Magnolia Boulevard from West Dravus Street to West Howe Street at 34th Avenue West, and from West Howe Street at Clise Place to West Galer Street at 29th Avenue West; and certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6033, and appropriating money from the City Street Fund in aid thereof.
